creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council with proceeds from the 2007 Antiques Show and Sale
description: brass wall sconce which converts to a candlestick by rotating the candleholder; oval shape; supports for candleholder cut from main body of piece; keyhole shape hanging hole at top center
inscription:
Inscription

on back, impressed: [HANDICRAFT GUILD MINNEAPOLIS]
title: Convertible wall sconce/chamber candlestick
